text: No Mercy, No Future () is a 1981 German drama movie directed by Helma Sanders- Brahms and starring Elisabeth Stepanek, Erika Dannhoff, Jorge Reis, Curt Curtini, Hasan Hasan. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Helma Sanders-Brahms
title: No Mercy, No Future
